params.f1_details: Deepak Yadav is one of the Founder of this institute. He has done his UG and PG(physics) from Guru Ghasidas Central University. He also have a great knowledge of Physics,and all.
params.f2_details: Shashwat Sen is also one of the main founders of this institute and Done his UG and PG (Electronics) from Guru Ghasidas Central University. He too have a great knowledge of Mathematics and Electronics
params.f3_details: Rupesh Sahu is a Founder too. Rupesh Done his UG and PG(Electronics) from Guru Ghasidas Central University. He have knowledge of almost every subject.
params.web_details: Yogendra is the one Who Designed the front-end and back-end of this website. The overall looks and functionality related issues would be resolved by him. He is also from Guru Ghasidas Central University.
params.web_team_quote: The overall website front-end and back-end is designed by this team
